name: h3
description: Experience the perfect balance of power and precision with the 2026 Louisville Slugger Atlas Drop 11 USA Baseball Bat. This bat is USA Baseball Certified, ensuring top-tier performance for both contact and power hitters. Its 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter and one-piece alloy construction, featuring an SL Hyper Alloy Barrel with a thinner wall design, deliver exceptional performance. The Turned Mass Damper technology minimizes hand vibration, enhancing the feel, while the SPD-Gen2 End Cap optimizes barrel performance. With a striking sky blue and red colorway and a premium LS Pro Comfort Grip, this bat offers superior tack and cushion for every swing. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
